To use the WISEBED Scala api use

Documentation

Usage:

</project>
    ...

    <dependencies>
       <dependency>
         <groupId>de.fau.wisebed</groupId>
         <artifactId>scala-API</artifactId>
         <version>1.1.0</version>
       </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    ...
    <repositories>
       ...
       <repository>
         <id>wisebed-maven-repository-releases</id>
         <url>http://wisebed.eu/maven/releases/</url>
       </repository>
       ...
    </repositories>    
    ...
</project>
